channel.title: Installing Bootware™ :: Zymbit Workshop
channel.description: A place to put the backup image Since we will be using Bootware™ to secure our device, we will need a place for the system to copy the entire SD Card as it encrypts it. For this, we’re going to use a USB Drive. We need to make sure that we can use our USB Drive properly. I often re-use them for other tasks, so here’s how I like to start out.
